constraints.name: alphabet_constraint
constraints.description: 字符串中的字符必须是前 k 个小写字母之一或问号
constraints.formal: s[i] ∈ {a, b, ..., k-th letter, ?} for all i

constraints.name: replacement_constraint
constraints.description: 每个问号必须被替换为前 k 个小写字母之一

constraints.name: min_max_substring_length
constraints.description: 字符串的值定义为所有字母的最大连续子串长度的最小值
constraints.formal: value(s) = min(f_i) for all i from 1 to k, where f_i is the length of the longest substring consisting entirely of the i-th letter
